content: i liked the virus shawl didn t like the yes-yes shawl tweaked it to somewhere in the middle i made my first one using classic sequins lite 264yds and ran out of yarn at the very last stitch this pattern is not a yarn eater depending how big you want to make it 275 to 450 yards should do it the size of the hook depends on what yarn you choose to use i prefer a fingering weight a big thank you to my sister karen who was my tester editor and advisor and who put up with me and an extra from another fellow crocheter who *got* what was in my head https //www ravelry com/projects/flyingflower/mutated-virus-shawl-a-and-b
